tooltip.en: The type of record the specimen is classified as. For physical collections, this field defaults to “PreservedSpecimen” (aka herbarium specimen) and for observation projects, the default is “Observation”. Example(s): PreservedSpecimen, LivingSpecimen, Observation. See Darwin Core's basisOfRecord.

meta.name: Basis of Record
meta.source: Darwin Core Quick Reference Guide, TDWG
